name: Color Dreams
description:
A mini game I made as a hobby where you try to match the colors. 

For OS X only

How To Play:

The five spheres at the top of the screen shows the randomized order of colors. 

The player must match the color of the sphere to the rectangular obstacles using right and left arrow keys in order to pass through. 

Tip: You can switch from the last color to the first color without scrolling through the others.
